name: Mistral
description:
Mistral is a fast paced action roguelike game build with replayability in mind. Explore the land of Mistral, pick relics to upgrade your character and vanquish your enemies.

  • Unique combat styles, master each weapons to your advantage !
  • Deep character upgrade system with large item selection. Strategize for your conquest !
  • Dying is not the end, unlock powers to get permanently stronger for your next run.

Challenging gameplay and dynamic combat mechanics.


The environment settings change each time you explore the world.


Go on adventure with your friends in co-op mode (up to 8 players). Or meet news friends.
